sense.gloss: to use properly, to use (different things) for different purposes

sdata.j: アメリカも↑本音↑↓ほんね↓と↑建前↑↓たてまえ↓を↑使↑↓|つか↓い↑分↑↓わ↓ける|↑国↑↓くに↓だ。
sdata.e: America is also a country that separates its public motives from its private ones.

sdata.j: アメリカも↑本音↑↓ほんね↓と↑建前↑↓たてまえ↓を↑使↑↓|つか↓い↑分↑↓わ↓ける|↑国↑↓くに↓だ。
sdata.e: America is also a country that separates its public face from its private one.

sdata.j: アメリカも↑本音↑↓ほんね↓と↑建前↑↓たてまえ↓を↑使↑↓|つか↓い↑分↑↓わ↓ける|↑国↑↓くに↓だ。
sdata.e: America is also a country that separates what one says and does in public from what one says and does behind closed doors.

sdata.j: アメリカも↑本音↑↓ほんね↓と↑建前↑↓たてまえ↓を↑使↑↓|つか↓い↑分↑↓わ↓ける|↑国↑↓くに↓だ。
sdata.e: America is also a country that separates public actions and statements from private ones.
